maqras.text: Aakhir humne usey badi sakheem (bimar /ill) halat mein ek chatiyal zameen par phenk diya
Aur uspar ek bail-daar darakht (a spreading plant of the gourd kind) uga diya
Iske baad humne usey ek lakh ya us sey zayad logon ki taraf bheja
Woh imaan laye aur humne ek waqt e khaas tak unhein baaqi rakkha
Phir zara in logon se pucho, kya (inke dil ko yeh baat lagti hai ke) tumhare Rubb ke liye to hon betiyan aur inke liye hon betay
Kya waqayi humne malaika (farishton) ko auratein banaya hai aur yeh aankhon dekhi baat keh rahey hain
Khoob sun rakkho, dar-asal yeh log apni mann ghadat se yeh baat kehte hain
Ke Allah aulad rakhta hai, aur fil waqayi yeh jhootey hain
Kya Allah ne beton ke bajaye betiyan apne liye pasand karli
Tumhein kya ho gaya hai, kaise hukum laga rahey ho
Kya tumhein hosh nahin aata
Ya phir tumhare paas apni in baaton ke liye koi saaf sanad (daleel) hai
To lao apni woh kitaab agar tum sachhey ho
Inhon ne Allah aur malaika ke darmiyan nasab (kinship)ka rishta bana rakkha hai, halanke malaika khoob jaante hain ke yeh log mujrim ki haisiyat se pesh honay waley hain
(aur woh kehte hain ke) “Allah un sifaat se paak hai
Jo uske khaalis bandon ke siwa dusre log uski taraf mansoob karte hain
Pas tum aur tumhare yeh mabood
Allah se kisi ko pher nahin sakte
Magar sifr usko jo dozakh ki bhadakti hui aag mein jhulasne wala ho
Aur hamara haal to yeh hai ke hum mein se har ek ka ek muqaam mukarrar hai
Aur hum saff basta (in rows) khidmatgaar hain
Tasbeeh karne waley hain.”
Yeh log pehle to kaha karte thay
Ke kaash hamare paas woh “Zikr” hota jo pichli qaumon ko mila tha
To hum Allah ke cheedah (chune huey/chosen) banday hotay
Magar (jab woh aa gaya) to inhon ne uska inkar kardiya, ab ankareeb inhein (is rawish ka natija) maloom ho jayega
Apne bheje huey bandon se hum pehle hi waada kar chuke hain
Ke yaqeenan unki madad ki jayegi
Aur hamara lashkar hi gaalib hokar rahega
Pas (aey Nabi) zara kuch muddat tak inhein inke haal par chodh do
Aur dekhte raho, anqareeb yeh khud bhi dekh lengey
Kya yeh hamare azaab ke liye jaldi macha rahey hain
Jab woh inke sehan (maidan/open space) mein aa utrega woh din un logon ke liye bahut bura hoga jinhein mutanabbeh (warn) kiya ja chuka hai
Pas zara inhein kuch muddat ke liye chodh do
Aur dekhte raho, anqareeb yeh khud dekh lenge
Paak hai tera Rubb, izzat ka maalik, un tamaam baaton se jo yeh log bana rahey hain
Aur salaam hai mursalin (messengers) par
Aur saari taarif Allah Rabbul Aalameen hi ke liye hai
Saad, kasam hai naseehat bharey Quran ki
Balke yahi log, jinhon ne maanney se inkar kiya hai, sakht takabbur aur zid mein mubtila hain
Insey pehle hum aisi kitni hi qaumon ko halaak kar chuke hain (aur jab unki shamat aayi hai) to woh cheekh utthey hain, magar woh waqt bachne ka nahin hota
In logon ko is baat par bada taajub hua ke ek darane wala khud inhi mein se aa gaya, munkireen kehne lagey ke “yeh saahir(sorcerer) hai, sakht jhoota hai
Kya isney saarey khudaon ki jagah bas ek hi khuda bana dala? Yeh to badi ajeeb baat hai”
Aur sardaran e qaum yeh kehte huey nikal gaye ke “ chalo aur dat-tey raho apne maboodon ki ibadat par. Yeh baat to kisi aur hi garaz se kahi ja rahi hai
Yeh baat humne zamana e qareeb ki millat mein kisi se nahin suni. Yeh kuch nahin hai magar ek man-ghadat baat

Kya hamarey darmiyan bas yahi ek shaks reh gaya tha jispar Allah ka zikr nazil kardiya gaya?”Asal baat yeh hai ke yeh mere “Zikr” par shakk kar rahey hain , aur yeh saari baatein isliye kar rahey hain ke inhon ne mere azaab ka maza chakkha nahin hai
Kya tere daata (great Bestower) aur gaalib parwardigar ki rehmat ke khazane inke kabze mein hain
Kya yeh aasmaan o zameen aur inke darmiyan ki cheezon ke maalik hain? Accha to yeh aalam e asbaab ki bulandiyon par chadh kar dekhein
Yeh to jatthon (armies) mein se ek choota sa jattha (army) hai jo isi jagah shikhast(suffer defeat) khane wala hai
Insey pehle Nooh ki qaum, aur Aad, aur mekhon (tent-pegs/stakes) wala Firoun
Aur Samood, aur qaum e Lut, aur aika waley jhutla chuke hain. Jatthay woh thay
Unmein se har ek ne Rasoolon ko jhutlaya aur meri uqubat ka faisla (decree of chastisement )uspar chaspan ho kar raha
Yeh log bhi bas ek dhamake ke muntazir hain jiske baad koi dusra dhamaka na hoga
Aur yeh kehte hain ke aey hamare Rubb, yaum ul hisaab(hisab ke din) se pehle hi hamara hissa humein jaldi se dey dey
(Aey Nabi), sabr karo un baaton par jo yeh log banate hain, aur inke saamne hamare banday Dawood ka qissa bayan karo jo badi quwaton ka maalik tha. Har maamle mein Allah ki taraf rujoo karne wala tha
Humne pahadon ko uske saath musakkhar kar rakkha tha ke subah o shaam woh uske saath tasbeeh karte thay
Parindey simat aate aur sabke sab uski tasbeeh ki taraf mutawajjeh ho jatey thay
Humne uski sultanat mazboot kardi thi, usko hikmat ata ki thi aur faislay-kun baat kehne ki salahiyat bakshi thi
